name: DodoGo! Robo
description:
Entertaining and accessible to
everyone, DodoGo! Robo is a puzzle
where you have to use your head to
avoid getting broken. No need to have
any knowledge of previous games to
explore this new episode of the
famous "DodoGo!" series: become
the well-known Robo-Egg and collect
the maximum number of icons
scattered around at new puzzle levels!
Itâ€™s your go! Use the stylus to help
your Robo progress then click on the
"play" button to see the result. You
can even change your route until your
Robo picks up all the icons for the
level you are playing!
